trans-unit.source: Represents the drawing properties of the 3D border skin.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the background color of a skin frame.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
Gets or sets the background gradient style of a skin frame.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
Gets or sets the background hatch style of a skin frame.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
Gets or sets the background image of a skin frame.
A `string` value.
Gets or sets the background image alignment of a skin frame.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackImageAlignment%2A> property is used by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode.Unscaled> drawing mode.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
Gets or sets a color that is replaced with a transparent color when the background image of a border skin frame is drawn.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
Gets or sets the drawing mode for the background image of a border skin frame.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref> enumeration value.
Gets or sets the secondary background color of a border skin frame.

This color is combined with the primary background color, which is set with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackColor%2A> property, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackHatchStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackGradientStyle%2A> properties are used.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
Gets or sets the border color of a skin frame.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
Gets or sets the style of the border line of a border skin frame.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
Gets or sets the width of the border line of a border skin frame.
An `integer` value.
Gets or sets the page color of a border skin.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
Gets or sets the style of a border skin.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkinStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
